Row.Text: New Civilization and Leader - John Curtin of Australia
Contains a new civilization and leader.
Which colony will make the most of Australia's natural riches?

In this 60 turn scenario, you race to explore Australia, find its natural resources, and use them to enrich your colony. This competitive economic scenario has no combat. It emphasizes exploration and territorial expansion to increase your Gold Per Turn net income, which is your score.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Single-player: Each difficulty has a Gold Per Turn threshold. Exceed that number before the end of the game to win.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Multiplayer: The player with the highest Gold Per Turn at end of the game is the winner.
